experience.title: Frontend Lead

experience.title: Full Stack Developer & UX Designer

My innovation transformed the sales team's operational workflow and made assignment management and job matching dramatically more efficient.

experience.title: Frontend Developer

experience.title: Technical Advisor, Frontend Developer
